title: Tour de France teams ask fans to behave better after mass pile-up in 15th stage
description: Tour de France overall leader Jonas Vingegaard is calling on fans to behave better at cycling’s biggest race after another mass crash marred the 15th stage

title: Canadian firefighter dies battling wildfire in Northwest Territories
description: A Canadian firefighter has died while battling a wildfire near his home community in the Northwest Territories

title: 1 dead, 1 critically injured after being knocked from gondola at Quebec resort
description: Canadian police say one person has died and another is critically injured after they were knocked out of a sightseeing gondola at the popular Mont-Tremblant resort

title: Over 1,000 flights in US canceled, as thunderstorms slam Northeast
description: More than 1,300 flights have been canceled and nearly 3,500 delayed across the United States Sunday, according FlightAware.

title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic in five sets to win Wimbledon
description: Carlos Alcaraz has ended Novak Djokovic’s 34-match winning streak at Wimbledon by beating him 1-6, 7-6 (6), 6-1, 3-6, 6-4 in an engaging, back-and-forth final to claim claiming his first championship at the All England Club

title: Another journalist killed in Mexico amid rising cartel violence
description: Another journalist has been killed in Mexico, adding to a growing list of reporters who have been murdered amid an intensifying drug war in the country

title: WATCH:  Officers rescue dog stuck underneath shed
description: Police officers worked together to free a dog who found herself stuck underneath a shed after she was believed to have been chasing after an opossum.

title: 5 sent to hospital after possible carbon monoxide exposure in Florida prison
description: People were evacuated from a federal prison camp in Florida on Sunday for suspected carbon monoxide exposure that sent two employees and three inmates to the hospital

title: WATCH:  Siren heard in Alaska town after 7.2-magnitude earthquake
description: A powerful 7.2-magnitude earthquake struck near the Alaska Peninsula, prompting a brief tsunami advisory Sunday morning.

title: Alabama rushes to adopt new congressional map amid disagreement on what district should look like
description: There's still disagreement on what the districts should look like.

title: Arrests made in a human remains trade tied to Harvard. Here's what to know
description: Federal investigators have arrested people in several states.

title: Actress, singer and style icon Jane Birkin dies in Paris at age 76
description: Actress and singer Jane Birkin has died at age 76, according to France’s Culture Ministry and French media

title: American fighter who was captured by Russia last year is back in Ukraine
description: Speaking exclusively to ABC News, Alex Drueke explained why he decided to leave Alabama and head east again.

title: 7.4-magnitude earthquake strikes near Alaska Peninsula, prompting tsunami advisory
description: A tsunami advisory was issued early Sunday for parts of coastal Alaska after a 7.4-magnitude earthquake struck the area.

title: Israel's Netanyahu is feeling 'very good' after overnight hospitalization following a dizzy spell
description: The office of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says he is still undergoing tests in hospital after a dizzy spell but is expected to be released later in the day

title: Powerball jackpot reaches $875 million, 3rd largest prize
description: The Powerball jackpot has continued to surge as no winner has been declared.

title: Elon Musk says Twitter has 'negative cash flow' and 'heavy debt'
description: Elon Musk says Twitter has "negative cash flow" and "heavy debt" due to lack of advertisers.

title: Federal judge rules Oregon’s tough new gun law is constitutional
description: Oregon’s voter-approved gun control measure is one of the toughest in the nation

title: Hundreds of migrants in southern Mexico form group to head toward US
description: Nearly a thousand migrants had recently crossed from Guatemala.

title: Musk says Twitter is losing cash because advertising is down and the company is carrying heavy debt
description: Elon Musk says the social media company is carrying heavy debt.

title: Escaped murder suspect Michael Burham captured, in custody: Police
description: Fugitive Michael Burham was taken into police custody after a week long manhunt, police said.
